projectName: Avatar: The Last Airbender Food Generator
description: A web-based creative tool for generating fictional dish concepts inspired by the world of 'Avatar: The Last Airbender' and 'The Legend of Korra.'
contributing: This project is open to contributions. If you have ideas for new ingredients, themes, or features, please feel free to open an issue or submit a pull request. The data is designed to be easily extensibleâ€”new ingredients can be added by simply editing the files in the `src/core/data/` directory.
